input.sentences: on our way to a historical re-enactment | we saw some beautiful purple flowers .
there were also pink flowers in an adjacent garden .
couples were lounging in the field | lazing the day away .
we stopped to take a photograph of an ironwork globe .
in the center of the park | a group of re-enactors passed by | dressed in historical attire .
output.sentences: First we saw the purple tulips.
Then it was in tot he red flowers.
After that we diced to take a nap in the grass.
We saw the statue in the park.
We sat and watched the people for the fair walk around.
